subdisciplines.name: Visual Anthropology
subdisciplines.description: The study of how visual media and forms shape our understanding of different cultures and societies.

subdisciplines.name: Visual Communication
subdisciplines.description: The study of how visual media and forms are used to communicate messages and ideas.

subdisciplines.name: Visual Semiotics
subdisciplines.description: The study of how visual signs and symbols are used to create meaning in different cultural contexts.
